title: Enhanced hydrogen uptake of dihydrogen complex via porous materials support
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11452-11455
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01182A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kaiji Uchida, Shunya Tanaka, Shuta Adachi, Hiroaki Iguchi, Ryota Sakamoto, Shinya Takaishi
This study shows using [Mo(PCy3)2(CO)3] complex supporting on the porous materials boosts H2 adsorption up to 9.3 times by enhancing gas access to metal sites.
